item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, January 19, 2025 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:

9. How Unix Spell Ran in 64kB RAM (18 points | 10 comments)
10. Lessons From Red Teaming 100 Generative AI Products (14 points | 12 comments)
